E guzobere Gallery Climate Coalition n'afọ 2020 iji dozie akara carbon nkè ahịa nka mba ụwa
Ọ bụ ezie na òtù ndị na-enweghị uru gụnyere Tate ekwuola màkà mgbanwe ihu igwe na mmetụta nka na ya, a na-eche na nké a bụ ihe mbụ ndị ọrụ nka azụmahịa mere.
Ndị guzobere ya gụnyere: Thomas Dane, Kate MacGarry, Sadie Coles na Greg Hilty nke Lisson Gallery, ónyé guzobere Frieze Art Fair Matthew Slotover na ónyé nduzi Victoria Siddall.
